THE SUPERIOR COURTS (COURT DRESS AND MODE OF 
ADDRESS) ORDER (REPEAL) ACT, 2020. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
CONTENTS 
 
1. Short title, and commencement.

Page 2 of 2 
 THE SUPERIOR COURTS (COURT DRESS AND MODE OF 
ADDRESS) ORDER (REPEAL) ACT, 2020. 
ACT NO. VIII OF 2020 
[21st February, 2020] 
An Act to repeal the President’s Order No. 15 of 19 80 
WHEREAS it is expedient to repeal the Superior Cour ts (Court Dress and Mode of 
Address) Order, 1980 (P.O. No. 15 of 1980);  
It is hereby enacted as follows:__  
1. Short title and commencement.  — (1) This Act may be called the Superior Courts 
(Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) Ac t, 2020. 
(2) It shall come into force at once.  
2. Repeal of President’s Order No. 15 of 1980.—  The Superior Courts (Court Dress 
and Mode of Address) Order, 1980 (P.O. No. 15 of 19 80), is hereby repealed.
